entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 3. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 5 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PDT Monday 10 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of rain showers or flurries. High 6. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries early in the morning and 60 percent chance of rain showers in the afternoon. Risk of thunderstorms in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High 6. Wind chill minus 5 in the morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PDT Monday 10 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Low minus 5. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of rain showers changing to 40 percent chance of flurries near midnight. Risk of thunderstorms early in the evening. Wind becoming west 20 km/h near midnight. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PDT Monday 10 April 2023
